title: ‘We Lost More Than We Won’: Roglič and His Quest for Historic 4th Vuelta Title in Peril After Costly Bike Change
content:
Roglič rues Cuitu Negru time penalty as O'Connor proves stubbornly resilient in red jersey: 'There’s still quite some work to do.'

Read the full article at ‘We Lost More Than We Won’: Roglič and His Quest for Historic 4th Vuelta Title in Peril After Costly Bike Change on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
